Advenella kashmirensis subsp. kashmirensis Shmareva et al. 2017, subsp. nov.

Advenella kashmirensis subsp. methylica Shmareva et al. 2017, subsp. nov.
Type strain: (see also StrainInfo.net) PK1=DSM 27514=VKM B-2850.
Sequence accession no. (16S rRNA) for the type strain: KF683075.
Etymology: N.L. fem. adj. methylica, pertaining to the methyl group; corresponds to the C1 group utilized by the microorganism.
Source: Plant.
Valid publication: VALIDATION LIST no. 173. List of new names and new combinations previously effectively, but not validly, published. Int. J. Syst. Evol. Microbiol., 67 (2017), 1-3.
Validation List Online
Effective publication: SHMAREVA, M. N., AGAFONOVA, N. V., KAPARULLINA, E. N., DORONINA, N. V. and TROTSENKO, Y. A. 2016. Emended descriptions of Advenella kashmirensis subsp. kashmirensis subsp. nov., Advenella kashmirensis subsp. methylica subsp. nov., and Methylopila turkiensis sp. nov. Microbiology, 85, 646-648.
Effective publication online

Cytophaga diffluens (ex Stanier 1940) Reichenbach 1989, sp. nov., nom. rev.
Cytophaga fermentans Bachmann 1955 (Approved Lists 1980), species.
Cytophaga flevensis van der Meulen et al. 1974 (Approved Lists 1980), species.
Cytophaga heparina (Payza and Korn 1956) Christensen 1980, comb. nov.
Cytophaga hutchinsonii Winogradsky 1929 (Approved Lists 1980), species.
Cytophaga johnsonae Stanier 1947 (Approved Lists 1980), species.
Cytophaga latercula Lewin 1969 (Approved Lists 1980), species.
Cytophaga lytica Lewin 1969 (Approved Lists 1980), species.
Cytophaga marina (ex Hikida et al. 1979) Reichenbach 1989, nom. rev., comb. nov.
Cytophaga marinoflava (ex Colwell et al. 1966) Reichenbach 1989, sp. nov., nom. rev.
Cytophaga pectinovora (ex Dorey 1959) Reichenbach 1989, nom. rev., comb. nov.
Cytophaga psychrophila (ex Borg 1960) Reichenbach 1989, sp. nov., nom. rev.
Cytophaga saccharophila (ex Agbo and Moss 1979) Reichenbach 1989, sp. nov., nom. rev.
Cytophaga salmonicolor Veldkamp 1961 (Approved Lists 1980), species.
Cytophaga succinicans (ex Anderson and Ordal 1961) Reichenbach 1989, sp. nov., nom. rev.
Cytophaga uliginosa (ZoBell and Upham 1944) Reichenbach 1989, comb. nov.
Cytophaga xylanolytica Haack and Breznak 1993, sp. nov.

  

¤ Cytophagaceae Stanier 1940 (Approved Lists 1980), familia.

  

¤ Cytophagales Leadbetter 1974 (Approved Lists 1980), ordo.

  

¤ Cytophagia Nakagawa 2012, class. nov.
